product.title: Raspberry (1051)
product.description: The velux energy blinds offers variable blackout and an insulation effect of up to 19%. Energy blinds are not fixed at the top of the bottom, so you can position them exactly where you need them for light control and privacy. Blackout effect. Flexible and stepless positioning. Improved insulation.
